text: Ángel Roberto Seifart (12 September 1941 - 2 July 2018) was a Paraguayan politician. He was a member of the Colorado Party. He was born in Asunción, Paraguay. Seifart was minister of education in the military government of Andrés Rodríguez. In 1993, he was elected Vice President of Paraguay as running mate of Juan Carlos Wasmosy for the period from 15 August 1993 to 15 August 1998 and also a minister in the cabinet of Raúl Cubas Grau. Seifart died in Asunción on 2 July 2018 from complications of chronic obstructive pulmonary disease, aged 76.Falleció Ángel Roberto Seifart ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from COPD Category:Judges Category:Vice presidents Category:People from Asunción Category:Paraguayan politicians
title: Ángel Roberto Seifart
